Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Alka-seltzer \Alka-seltzer\ n. 1. a commerical antacid; -- the tablets dissolve in water to give an effervescent solution. [trademark] WordNet 1.5]
Alka-seltzer n : a commercial antacid; tablets dissolve in water to give an effervescent solution
